title: Scrambled Fetta Eggs with Tomato and Basil Salsa
directions: Combine tomato, basil and season to taste. Lightly whisk eggs and fetta cheese together and season with pepper.
Melt butter in a non-stick frypan, add eggs and cook over gentle heat, stirring occasionally, until lightly scrambled and almost set.
Serve on toasted baguette, topped with spoonfuls of fresh tomato salsa.
ingredients: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
